name: Italia
startIntroPart1: Dai primi villaggi delle antiche tribù italiche alla grandezza di Roma: l'inizio di una avventura millenaria, forgiata dalla volontà e sempre illuminata da cultura e scienza. La storia di Italia è una parte portante della Storia.
startIntroPart2: Guida il tuo popolo attraverso i secoli, accogli nuove popolazioni ad arricchire la tua stirpe, accompagna l'epopea dei comuni e delle repubbliche marinare, ammira la gloria del Rinascimento, combatti per il Risorgimento e l'Indipendenza. Garantisci Libertà, Democrazie e Giustizia al mondo!
declaringWar: Dov'è la Vittoria?! Le porga la chioma, ché schiava di Roma Iddio la creò.
attacked: Vuoi davvero sfidare il Tricolore? Sarai sconfitto dall'Italia Turrita!
defeated: Incredibile: siamo stati sconfitti. Quante generazioni dovranno passare affinchè torni la luce nel mondo?
introduction: Oggi il fato vi ha offerto il regalo più grande: potete finalmente unirvi al nostro impero!
neutralHello: Salute viaggiatori, cosa vi porta fin qui?
neutralYes: E' un piacere fare affare con voi.
afterPeace: Molto bene, tutti quei combattimenti stavano diventando noiosi comunque.
tradeRequest: Vi concediamo l'onore di questa offerta commerciale.
uniqueText: Una cultura millenaria, figlia di Roma, erede dei Comuni e delle Repubbliche Marinare che prospera con Cultura, Scienza e Resilieza.
uniques: [+10]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+15]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[All] units gain the [Stringiamci a coorte] promotion
[All] units gain the [Resilienza italiana] promotion
Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]> <Suppress warning [*contains a conditional on a unit movement unique*]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <starting from the [Ancient era]>
[+1] Sight <for [Embarked] units>

name: Rio de Janeiro
declaringWar: I have to do this, for the sake of progress if nothing else. You must be opposed!

defeated: May God grant me these last wishes - peace and prosperity for Brazil.

name: Sydney
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, for war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.

name: Ur
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Why do we fight? Because Inanna demands it. Now, witness the power of the Sumerians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?

name: Vancouver
declaringWar: In responding to the unstinting malignancy that has heretofore defined your relationship with Canada, we can have no recourse but war!
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: I regret not defending my country to the last, although it was not of use.

name: Dublin
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?

name: Edinburgh
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.
